duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and manage network infrastructure with a focus on security, reliability, and performance.
Provide technical support for networking projects and configure NGFW systems to enhance network security.
Optimize SDWAN technologies to improve network performance and reduce operational costs.
Deploy and manage network infrastructure services, including DNS and DHCP, to ensure seamless connectivity.
Configure and manage VPNs for secure remote communication and integrate networking in a multi-cloud environment.
Develop automation scripts to streamline network provisioning and enhance operational efficiency.
Lead change control processes and resolve network-related incidents promptly and efficiently.
Establish and maintain strong communications and relationships with other IT teams and business units.
Stay informed about current technologies and industry trends to provide up-to-date support and solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Network Engineering, or a related field. Equivalent experience is also acceptable.
